6680C82B.VoiceDir3.FB73C: Going through the motions--not convinced that this villager is telling the truth, but trying to stay civil

8ECD5C34.Line1.10B51D: I tell you, my neighbor is bewitched! I saw him skulking outside my door, muttering curses.

DF038801.VoiceDir1.10B51D: Insistent (but in reality the villager is probably lying about his neighbor because of some personal vendetta)

F77761FE.Line3.FB73C: Right, right. This wouldn't have anything to do with the money you owe him, would it?
